title: Chicken, butternut squash and leek pie
ingredients: ['1/2 butternut squash, peeled and diced', '40g butter', '2 white onions, finely chopped', '1 stick celery, sliced', '55g bacon, chopped', '2 leeks, sliced', '600g cooked chicken breast, chopped', '250ml double cream', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1 packet puff pastry', '1 egg, beaten']
